content.raw:
Oh yes, damn it. That was it. Found another typo-based mistake which I could solve on my own. Now this works fine.

We have more remote devices, especially our camera\_server and an optical\_tweezer\_server running in the other experiment which I haven’t tested yet but this could take some time. So don’t wait for that for merging. I will contact you if more questions are coming up.
content.html:
Oh yes, damn it. That was it. Found another typo-based mistake which I could solve on my own. Now this works fine.

We have more remote devices, especially our camera_server and an optical_tweezer_server running in the other experiment which I haven’t tested yet but this could take some time. So don’t wait for that for merging. I will contact you if more questions are coming up.
